attributes.review: I thought this app would be like the Jeremy Renner app, but it was completely different!! I couldn’t like ANY posts and there was no reason for me to believe that Donald Trump was on the app! I am dissatisfied and disappointed :-(
attributes.title: Not a good app

attributes.review: I downloaded this to support our favorite dictator, bunker boy but something went wrong when he did all that racist, homophobic, and transphobic stuff!😅 I mean Jesus wouldn’t have liked this app so I can’t either🤷🏻‍♀️ sorry babes
attributes.title: Uh oh

attributes.review: I read the terms and condition for this app and it steals your private information and sells it to leftist organizations. You will start getting emails from various political parties asking you for money.
attributes.title: App steals private info, do not download!!!

attributes.review: girl i don’t even know WHERE to start but i ain’t voting for some dusty orange cheeto lmaoaoao i may be 12 but that don’t mean i can share my opinions bbg ;) anywayz stream K-12 😻😻😻 y’all are roaches biden 2020 sadly but anyone but that cheeto hahahahah😘😘 he is a r@pist my guy 💔💔💔
attributes.title: Y’all really supporting racist in 2020 smh

attributes.review: honestly trump supporters should shoot for the stars 💅✨🧚🌷🌺but hopefully the gun is backwards and pointing at your head🌿🐚🎋but no brain splatters will come out 🌿✨💅cause you have no brain🌸🌺✨😹u delusional psychopath✨✨ anyway😌😌trump is racist, a white supremacist, and a homophobe 🐚✨ so if you support him, you’re blind and deaf 🌸 sis, ur the next helen keller ✨😹 you know what they say 🌷🧚💅 they say: 👨‍🦯👩‍🦯 maga 2020 is a joke 🌺🌷 remember only 6,000 people shew up to that rally 😹 pathetic president, pathetic life ✨✨
attributes.title: honesty is the best policy 😌

attributes.review: Don’t download it, you’ll regret it. Nothing but glitches, didn’t properly download. I thought the Apple App Store has safe non-racist and non-white supremacist content. But this is app is FILLED WITH RACISM. So disappointed, definitely not voting for Trump EVER.
attributes.title: Disappointed AF

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support MY wonderful president sir Donald J Trump, and without hours my contacts had been hacked and sent disgusting liberal propaganda and fake news. Mr Trump has used our country. I no longer trust or support Him. Do not download.
attributes.title: Hacked my phone, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: My koala was trying to use this app with his best mate, the chimpanzee, and well let’s just say it didn’t work!! it kept exiting them out. i guess the homies are now democrats just cause of this failure of an app!
attributes.title: It broke down??

attributes.review: Do you think that if you don’t read the bad reviews, the app is good? Just because you don’t know something is happening doesn’t mean that it isn’t happening
attributes.title: Very bad

attributes.review: Wouldn’t stay open for more than 2 minutes before crashing
attributes.title: Kept crashing
